name: Wave Cool Water Body Spray
description:
Feel rejuvenated and invigorated all day with Wave Cool Water Body Spray. This refreshing body spray delivers a crisp, cool fragrance that’s perfect for daily use, leaving you smelling fresh and feeling confident. • Refreshing Scent: A cool, aquatic fragrance that provides an instant burst of freshness.• Long-Lasting: Keeps you smelling great throughout the day.• Light and Non-Greasy: Quickly absorbs into the skin without leaving a sticky residue.• Versatile Use: Ideal for everyday wear, after a workout, or to freshen up during the day. Why Choose Wave Cool Water Body Spray?• A cool, crisp scent that is both energizing and calming.• Convenient 150ml bottle, perfect for carrying in your bag or for use at home.• Perfect for all skin types with a gentle and refreshing formula. Refresh your senses and stay cool with Wave Cool Water Body Spray—a splash of freshness in every spritz!
Feel rejuvenated and invigorated all day with Wave Cool Water Body Spray. This refreshing body spray delivers a crisp, cool fragrance that’s perfect for daily use, leaving you smelling fresh and feeling confident.
 
• Refreshing Scent: A cool, aquatic fragrance that provides an instant burst of freshness.
• Long-Lasting: Keeps you smelling great throughout the day.
• Light and Non-Greasy: Quickly absorbs into the skin without leaving a sticky residue.
• Versatile Use: Ideal for everyday wear, after a workout, or to freshen up during the day.
 
Why Choose Wave Cool Water Body Spray?
• A cool, crisp scent that is both energizing and calming.
• Convenient 150ml bottle, perfect for carrying in your bag or for use at home.
• Perfect for all skin types with a gentle and refreshing formula.
 
Refresh your senses and stay cool with Wave Cool Water Body Spray—a splash of freshness in every spritz!

name: Nivea Men Fresh Active Deodorant
description:
Beat the heat with the NIVEA Men Fresh Active Roll On. With refreshing tones of ocean extracts, stay fresh, stay active this summer. The masculine fragrance keeps you fresh and confident all day while the care complex takes care of your underarm skin.

name: Fogg Body Spray Napoleon
description:
Fogg Body Spray Napoleon is a premium deodorant designed for individuals who prefer a bold and long-lasting fragrance. It features a distinctive masculine scent with a blend of woody, musky, and spicy notes, making it perfect for everyday use or special occasions. The no-gas formula ensures more sprays and better coverage for all-day freshness. Features:Intense Fragrance: Offers a strong and masculine scent that lasts all day.No Gas Formula: Contains a higher concentration of perfume for longer usage.Wide Applicability: Suitable for daily wear, office, or evening events.Compact and Travel-Friendly: Easy to carry for use on the go. Uses: Daily Freshness, Occasions, Workout Essential. Benefits:Long-Lasting Freshness: Keeps body odor at bay for hours.Bold Aroma: Enhances confidence with its powerful and commanding scent.Gentle on Skin: Designed to minimize irritation or dryness.Versatile: Suitable for all-day use, regardless of the setting.Long lasting fragrance that lasts for 10-12 hoursEnsures 800 sprays.

name: Fogg Body spray Royal
description:
Fogg Body Spray Royal is an elegant and refreshing deodorant crafted for those who prefer a subtle yet captivating fragrance. It combines fresh, floral, and musky notes to create a regal and sophisticated scent. Perfect for daily use, it ensures long-lasting freshness and confidence with its no-gas formula. Features:Long-Lasting Fragrance: Keeps you fresh and odor-free for hours.No Gas Formula: Pure perfume composition for maximum usage.Refined Scent: A blend of fresh and musky tones, ideal for a sophisticated appeal.Compact Design: Travel-friendly size, suitable for on-the-go freshness. Uses: Daily Freshness, Occasions, Workout Essential. Benefits:Subtle and Sophisticated: Offers a regal, understated aroma perfect for any occasion.Skin-Friendly Formula: Designed to be gentle on the skin for everyday use.Non-Sticky: Does not leave residue on skin or clothes.Versatile Use: Suitable for both casual and formal settings.

description:
Use any of the 6 variants of Kool Body Spray in any mood or occasion. The musky-fresh fragrance of Kool Deodorant Body Spray will keep the body perfumed and feeling alive for a long time. Ingredients: Butane, Propane, Alcohol Denat, Isopropyl, Myristate, Propylene Glycol, Triclosan, Perfume.

name: Nivea Men Body Spray Cool Kick Extra Dry
description:
• The cool care formula with a fresh masculine fragrance keeps you fresh for longer.   • The antiperspirant formula regulates sweating in your underarms and helps control body odour. • No alcohol and NIVEA men care complex, to take care of your underarm skin. How To Use-  Step 1 - Hold the can 15cm away from the underarms.  Step 2 - Spray directly on the underarm skin - do not spray on broken/irritated skin. Do not spray on clothes.  Step 3 - Allow it to dry completely.  Step 4 - Stay fresh all day long.
